  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>dc37c848-7399-42de-a5d2-3aa63d2856c4#1#5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A szaglás és az ízérzékelés</string>
            <string language="en">Smelling and sensation of taste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Riechen und Empfindung des Geschmacks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sentir et sensation de goût</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cheirar e sensation do gosto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sentendo l'odore e sensazione di gusto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μυρωδιά και αίσθηση της προτίμησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El oler y sensación del gusto</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A kémiai érzékelés; a szaglás és az ízlelés folyamata</string>
            <string language="en">The chemical sensation; process of smelling and tasting</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">érzékelés,  érzőműködés,  ízlelés,  szaglás,  </string>
            <string language="en">sensation, sensory functioning, tasting, smelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die chemische Empfindung; Prozeß des 
Riechens und des Schmeckens</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La sensation chimique ; processus de sentir
et de goûter</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sensation químico; processo de cheirar e
de provar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La sensazione chimica; processo di sentire 
l'odore e di avere un sapore</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χημική αίσθηση  διαδικασία και</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La sensación química; proceso de oler y 
de probar</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Empfindung, sensorisches Arbeiten, Schmecken, riechend</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sensation, fonctionnement sensoriel, goûter, sentant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sensation, funcionar sensory, provar, cheirando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sensazione, funzionamento sensitivo, avere un sapore, 
sentente l'odore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αίσθηση, αισθητήρια λειτουργία, δοκιμή, μυρωδιά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sensación, funcionamiento sensorial, el probar, 
oliendo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
